name: AVContentKeySystem
desc: A key-delivery method for a content key session.

items.name: static let fairPlayStreaming: AVContentKeySystem
items.desc: A method of key delivery that uses FairPlay Streaming.

items.name: static let clearKey: AVContentKeySystem
items.desc: A method of key delivery that uses a clear key system.

items.name: static let authorizationToken: AVContentKeySystem
items.desc: A method of key delivery that uses a token to authorize playback.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a content key system with a string value.
